body:
When you are playing nebula and you want some one to protect the monument do it yourself
otherwise you wont get things done and the other team will break your monument
life lesson: "do it yourself or you'll never get things done"
unless you can catch your own teams attention you're fine, but if you can't do it yourself. :\

title: Words of wisdom from Fluffy.... Nebula

replies.body: When I defend and someone breaks my defence and covers the monument...

replies.body: I am pretty surprised most people don't do this anyways, maybe it is because some maps have the monument in a very far location from spawn

but... wut if two forum users r like, "im ginna go pertect th monumint nao." 

And then they see each other and they r liek, "betch, i em pertecing et. go fite sum1."

And then they get into a huge argument and get banned????????


HMMM?????????????

replies.body: speaking of idiots protecting monuments...... NEVER put random blocks around the monuments and continually expanding it... ive lost too many games this way and it is horrible.... it is the most generic mistake i think i have seen new players make.... they fully cover the monument and then someone tunnels straight through and then they break it.......
